reviews.productTitle: SOZULAMP 3 Way Light Switch with Night Light-Easy to Install-No Neutral Required,Illuminated Three Way Switch with Light Sensor,15 Amp 110V,Residential Grade(2Pack,Dayligh LED)
reviews.text: These switches have worked well since installing them several months ago however they are pretty noisy and sometimes difficult to switch as they seem to want to stay in the on or off position. Flipping one of these switches in a room where someone is sleeping will most definitely wake them up if they are a light sleeper.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2025
reviews.title: Light is very bright, switch is loud when flipped

reviews.productTitle: SOZULAMP 3 Way Light Switch with Night Light-Easy to Install-No Neutral Required,Illuminated Three Way Switch with Light Sensor,15 Amp 110V,Residential Grade(2Pack,Dayligh LED)
reviews.text: Incredible amount of light for the small area where the lights are. Shines up or down, which is good for a three way where down isn't always off. The day/night sensor (the tiny hole in the switch) is sensitive. Sometimes walking past will make the light come on, but no big thing. Now I don't have to try to walk around in the dark!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2024
reviews.title: Love these

reviews.text: Love the little LEDS under the switch. Just enough light at night to highlight the floor and makes the house look cozy. Perfect for bathrooms as well. I'm putting them all over the house. I used one Rocker Light per gang box no matter how many switch's. Make sure to buy the switch with the 3 Way. Incase the light can be turned off and on by a different switch. They are not Motion Detected they light up in low light. Love them.

reviews.text: Picture shows night light shining up, or down. You‚Äôll want it pointing down, away from your eyes at night. But to do that, the switch has to be installed upside down, where ‚Äúon‚Äù is flipping the toggle down to the ‚Äúoff‚Äù position. You‚Äôll understand better when you buy it, install it, reinstall it, flip it over, repeat and just leave it in the on position when off. Enjoy lol

reviews.text: Total waste of money. I bought a few products from this brand and had 3 of them break within 9 months of installation. All broke in the same exact way (the plastic joint in the middle of the switch erodes and then pops out). Totally flimsy/low quality design. Highly advise anyone to stay away from these products.

reviews.productTitle: SOZULAMP 3 Way Light Switch with Night Light-Easy to Install-No Neutral Required,Illuminated Three Way Switch with Light Sensor,15 Amp 110V,Residential Grade(2Pack,Dayligh LED)
reviews.text: I have two sets of these installed in my home. Both locations are stairs with the top location being a stair/ hallway setup. These lights are powerful enough to make it easy to navigate to the switch without being a bothersome. (too bright) I love the ambient light sensor to help minimize running the night light when it is not necessary. When it comes to installing it was very easy to install. However, if you don't understand basic wiring of a three-way switch, I would highly recommend that you watch several YouTube videos and take a picture of the current switch setup before you remove the old switch. These are light years cheaper than going to the big box stores. I highly recommend purchasing these switches!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.title: Such a great setup for hallway light switches!

reviews.text: This doubles as a night light and has saved me from many toe stubs and stepping on sharp kids toys at night. reviews.text: To start, this switch does not operate like a conventional 3-way switch because your main switch will need to be in the on position in order for the 2nd/slave switch to function. The only thing I like about this switch is that it serves as a night light or location light so you don't fumble around in the dark to locate the switch.

reviews.title: Not a true 3-way switch

reviews.productTitle: SOZULAMP 3 Way Light Switch with Night Light-Easy to Install-No Neutral Required,Illuminated Three Way Switch with Light Sensor,15 Amp 110V,Residential Grade(2Pack,Dayligh LED)
reviews.text: Bought this to see if it would work the way I wanted to and it does. I didn‚Äôt want it to be so bright but obviously able to see in a dark hallway. Works great and has lights above and below in case other side is flipped the opposite way. Install took maybe 5-10 min. What took the longest time was figuring out which breaker (not properly labeled) was for the switch I was working on. Other than that fast, easy and works as described. I plan on buying another set for my garage. Since it has a sensor the light did shut off when I pointed the light at it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2021
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.text: Installed this in my upstairs hallway which was always pitch dark at night and it was hard to find the light switch. This makes it both easy to find the switch as well as provides just the right amount of light for use as a night light.

reviews.title: LED brightness is just right as both a nightlight and for finding the switch in the dark.
